Posts.Content:
I have never been on this section of the forum before but does anyone know for a fact, or a medical opinion on whether or not wearing a bra to bed can increase ones chances to get breast cancer? Is that a rumor? My fiance' insists on wearing one to bed fearing that they will somehow sag as they get older and personally it scares me that she continues to wear it to sleep.
Thanks,
Cutter
Posts.Title: Quick Question
